flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 227 books were taken, so there are 235 - 227= <<235-227=8>>8 books left.
56 books were brought back on Thursday, so there are 8 + 56 = <<8+56=62>>62 books in the library.
Finally, 35 books are taken out on Friday, leaving 62 - 35 = <<62-35=27>>27 books available.
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 62. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
